To Whom It May Concern: 
 
I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized
to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner
being named John Wiley & Sons, Inc., a global publisher of books, journals, and
other products, or one of its related companies ("Wiley"). 
 
We recently learned that unauthorized copies of the material listed below are
available for download on a website hosted by your company at the following URL
address: http://squirrel.125mb.com.
